snippet: Fixing a small error in a criminal history can be a huge headache, a fact highlighted by an analysis that found mistakes in the records of 2.1 million New Yorkers.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column on Legal Action Center analysis revealing mistakes in arrest and warrant records of 2.1 million New Yorkers; suggests that these bureaucratic mistakes can alter lives, keeping those wrongly flagged from getting jobs.
lead_paragraph: Fixing a small error in a criminal history can be a huge headache, a fact highlighted by an analysis that found mistakes in the records of 2.1 million New Yorkers.

headline.main: Arrest Records, Old and Faulty, May Haunt Many
headline.print_headline: Arrest Records, Old and Faulty, May Haunt
